title: Cardiovascular Physiology Misconception Diagnosis and Metacognitive Enhancement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physiology and mathematical modeling knowledge
context.additional_context: Graduate-level project-based learning environment analyzing cardiovascular physiology concepts through mathematical approaches, emphasizing collaborative formative assessment using personal devices

learning_goals: Using multi-stage assessment methods, over 80% of learners can identify their misconceptions in cardiovascular physiology
Through metacognitive assessments, over 70% of learners can enhance their ability to accurately self-assess their level of understanding
Each project team can analyze three or more cardiovascular physiology misconception cases using mathematical models and write a concept reconstruction report
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
